title: Hiver Demo Somerset County Educational Services Commission<> Cole

signals.problem_statement: The customer is limited in their ability to streamline workflows and tags due to a legacy plan with Helpscout.
signals.customer_ask: They are looking to see if Hiver can solve some of the issues they are currently facing and be more efficient.
signals.context: Special education transportation department with a significant budget increase and a growing number of users.

signals.problem_statement: The customer cannot create or manage company profiles effectively, leading to difficulties in handling multiple contacts from the same organization.
signals.customer_ask: They want to know if Hiver can allow them to create company profiles.
signals.suggested_solution: The customer suggested that they need company profiles for better organization.
signals.context: Managing multiple contacts from various districts and transportation companies.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the limitations on the number of recipients for outgoing emails, which could affect their communication with contractors and districts.
signals.customer_ask: They need clarification on whether Hiver has a limit on the number of recipients for outgoing emails.
signals.context: Sending emails to contractors and districts for important information.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for a way to set reminders or timers on emails to ensure follow-ups are not missed.
signals.customer_ask: They want to know if they can set a timer for emails to pop back up in the queue.
signals.suggested_solution: The customer suggested having a feature to remind them to follow up on emails.
signals.context: Managing follow-ups with contractors regarding student information.
